english.segment1: Surprise surprise. I've had such a hard time. Trying to keep my promises
english.segment2: The things I say I. Just don't do. I need some rescue. From myself
english.segment3: A thousand times, a thousand lies. I just don't understand. Do You believe me anymore?
english.segment4: Chorus: I cannot cross this great divide. Without Your hand. Surprise surprise. All Your wonders never cease. To amaze me; even me
english.segment5: I get so nervous. I get so tongue-tied. When I'm around You. My love
english.segment6: You see straight through me. My words are empty. But You still believe my promises
english.segment7: Mouthfull of fire, I speak desire. And deceitful things. I don't believe me anymore
